result.content:
Liferay Scenario Libraries | Selenium Plugin Documentation and Examples | Selenium Plugin Acceptance Test Examples | More Examples...[?]

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .liferay.ScenarioLibrary (edit)

import
six42.fitnesse.jdbcslim

define table type
SQLCommand as Table

variable defined: BAD_REQUEST=400
variable defined: INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR=500
variable defined: NOT_FOUND=404
variable defined: SUCCESS_CREATED=201
variable defined: SUCCESS_OK=200

variable defined: PARTY_ID=UNDEFINED
variable defined: PRODUCT_KEY=UNDEFINED
variable defined: MEMBERSHIP_ID=UNDEFINED

scenario Given scenario
@{scenario}

scenario When scenario
@{scenario}

scenario Then scenario
@{scenario}

scenario And scenario
@{scenario}

scenario the current page url should be url
check location @{url}

scenario user can see item
ensure is visible on page @{item}

scenario user can click item
ensure is enabled @{item}


scenario user see and can click item
seconds before timeout 5
user can see @{item}
user can click @{item}
show take screenshot footer

scenario a page url url
set browser size to maximum
delete all cookies
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 30
open @{url}

scenario user user sign in with username username and password password
wait for visible Sign In
click Sign In
wait for visible Email Address
enter @{username} as Email Address
enter @{password} as Password
show take screenshot loginScreen
press enter
wait for visible @{user}
show take screenshot loginSuccess

scenario a user signs in
user undefined variable: TEST_USER_FIRSTNAME sign in with username supervisor and password Test123

scenario a supervisor signs in
user ruel sign in with username ruel@discovery.co.za and password test1

scenario hover over product menu
seconds before timeout 5
hover over id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId

scenario hover over product menu
seconds before timeout 5
note hover over id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId

scenario activate product menu
hover over product menu
note We have to simulate with precision as selenium tends to run the click too fast that prevents clicking of the side bar
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler"]
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler"]
wait 2 seconds
show take screenshot sideBar
check value of attribute class on id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open

scenario close product menu
hover over product menu
note We have to simulate with precision as selenium tends to run the click too fast that prevents clicking of the side bar
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open"]
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open"]
wait 2 seconds
show take screenshot sideBar
check not value of attribute class on id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open

scenario all VSP sites should be visible
note A user must be signed in first
activate product menu
seconds before timeout 10
click if available id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_manageSitesLink
show take screenshot loadingAnimation
wait for visible Select Site
wait for visible Vitality Group
wait for visible Vitality Service Portal - France
wait for visible Vitality Service Portal - Germany
show take screenshot availableSites

scenario user clicks Member Search and search using party id partyID
click xpath=//*[@id="portlet_za_co_discovery_vitality_member_quick_search_portlet_MemberQuickSearchPortlet"]/div/div/div/a
wait 2 seconds
enter @{partyID} as xpath=//*[@id="partyID"]
wait 1 seconds
click xpath=//*[@id="portlet_za_co_discovery_vitality_member_quick_search_portlet_MemberQuickSearchPortlet"]/div/div/div/ul/li/form/div[1]/span/button/span
wait 7 seconds

scenario user search a member with first name firstName and surname Surname and birthdate birthdate
enter @{firstName} as xpath=//*[@id="first-name"]
enter @{surname} as xpath=//*[@id="sur-name"]
enter @{birthdate} as xpath=//*[@id="birth-date"]
wait seconds 2
click xpath=//*[@id="first-name"]
show take screenshot Party details is populated
scroll to xpath=//*[@id="searchButton"]
click xpath=//*[@id="searchButton"]
wait seconds 5
check is visible Member Search Result true
show take screenshot Search Result by Party details

scenario user search a member by reference Member Number with a value 123456
select Member Number for xpath=//*[@id="referenceType"]
enter 123456 as xpath=//*[@id="referenceValue"]
wait 2 seconds
click xpath=//*[@id="memberSearchButton"]
wait 5 seconds

Import
nl.hsac.fitnesse.fixture
nl.hsac.fitnesse.fixture.slim

Import
nl.hsac.fitnesse.fixture.slim.web
nl.hsac.fitnesse.fixture.FixtureDebugTest

script selenium driver setup
start driver for chrome




Liferay Scenario Libraries | Selenium Plugin Documentation and Examples | Selenium Plugin Acceptance Test Examples | More Examples...[?]

Scenario Libraries

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .liferay.ScenarioLibrary (edit)

import
six42.fitnesse.jdbcslim

define table type
SQLCommand as Table

variable defined: BAD_REQUEST=400
variable defined: INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR=500
variable defined: NOT_FOUND=404
variable defined: SUCCESS_CREATED=201
variable defined: SUCCESS_OK=200

variable defined: PARTY_ID=UNDEFINED
variable defined: PRODUCT_KEY=UNDEFINED
variable defined: MEMBERSHIP_ID=UNDEFINED

scenario Given scenario
@{scenario}

scenario When scenario
@{scenario}

scenario Then scenario
@{scenario}

scenario And scenario
@{scenario}

scenario the current page url should be url
check location @{url}

scenario user can see item
ensure is visible on page @{item}

scenario user can click item
ensure is enabled @{item}


scenario user see and can click item
seconds before timeout 5
user can see @{item}
user can click @{item}
show take screenshot footer

scenario a page url url
set browser size to maximum
delete all cookies
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 30
open @{url}

scenario user user sign in with username username and password password
wait for visible Sign In
click Sign In
wait for visible Email Address
enter @{username} as Email Address
enter @{password} as Password
show take screenshot loginScreen
press enter
wait for visible @{user}
show take screenshot loginSuccess

scenario a user signs in
user undefined variable: TEST_USER_FIRSTNAME sign in with username supervisor and password Test123

scenario a supervisor signs in
user ruel sign in with username ruel@discovery.co.za and password test1

scenario hover over product menu
seconds before timeout 5
hover over id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId

scenario hover over product menu
seconds before timeout 5
note hover over id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId

scenario activate product menu
hover over product menu
note We have to simulate with precision as selenium tends to run the click too fast that prevents clicking of the side bar
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler"]
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler"]
wait 2 seconds
show take screenshot sideBar
check value of attribute class on id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open

scenario close product menu
hover over product menu
note We have to simulate with precision as selenium tends to run the click too fast that prevents clicking of the side bar
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open"]
wait 2 seconds
show click if available xpath=//*[@class="control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open"]
wait 2 seconds
show take screenshot sideBar
check not value of attribute class on id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_sidenavToggleId control-menu-icon lfr-portal-tooltip product-menu-toggle sidenav-toggler active open

scenario all VSP sites should be visible
note A user must be signed in first
activate product menu
seconds before timeout 10
click if available id=_com_liferay_product_navigation_product_menu_web_portlet_ProductMenuPortlet_manageSitesLink
show take screenshot loadingAnimation
wait for visible Select Site
wait for visible Vitality Group
wait for visible Vitality Service Portal - France
wait for visible Vitality Service Portal - Germany
show take screenshot availableSites

scenario user clicks Member Search and search using party id partyID
click xpath=//*[@id="portlet_za_co_discovery_vitality_member_quick_search_portlet_MemberQuickSearchPortlet"]/div/div/div/a
wait 2 seconds
enter @{partyID} as xpath=//*[@id="partyID"]
wait 1 seconds
click xpath=//*[@id="portlet_za_co_discovery_vitality_member_quick_search_portlet_MemberQuickSearchPortlet"]/div/div/div/ul/li/form/div[1]/span/button/span
wait 7 seconds

scenario user search a member with first name firstName and surname Surname and birthdate birthdate
enter @{firstName} as xpath=//*[@id="first-name"]
enter @{surname} as xpath=//*[@id="sur-name"]
enter @{birthdate} as xpath=//*[@id="birth-date"]
wait seconds 2
click xpath=//*[@id="first-name"]
show take screenshot Party details is populated
scroll to xpath=//*[@id="searchButton"]
click xpath=//*[@id="searchButton"]
wait seconds 5
check is visible Member Search Result true
show take screenshot Search Result by Party details

scenario user search a member by reference Member Number with a value 123456
select Member Number for xpath=//*[@id="referenceType"]
enter 123456 as xpath=//*[@id="referenceValue"]
wait 2 seconds
click xpath=//*[@id="memberSearchButton"]
wait 5 seconds
  • Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .liferay.VitalityMembersPortal.ScenarioLibrary (edit)

scenario a user access to vitality Member Portal
delete all cookies
wait seconds 3
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 40
set browser size to maximum
open https://www.test.vitality.sumitomolife.co.jp/en/web/vitality-member-portal
wait seconds 3
show take screenshot open url

scenario login using email address email and password password
open https://www.test.vitality.sumitomolife.co.jp/en/web/vitality-member-portal/login
note click Login
wait for visible Email Address
wait for visible Password
enter @{email} as xpath=//*[@id="email"]
wait seconds 1
enter @{password} as xpath=//*[@id="password"]
wait seconds 1
show take screenshot enter login
wait seconds 2
click xpath=//button[@id="login"]
wait seconds 5

scenario a user login to VMP
login using email address Weldon_McAlbert@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario an existing user login to VMP
login using email address Rosendo_McBurdick@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

  • Expand
  • Collapse

NSD

scenario a user login to VMP for NSD submission
login using email address Doria_McBills@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario a user login to VMP but will not submit NSD
login using email address undefined variable: FOR_NSD2 and password TestPass123

scenario a user access VMP NSD site
wait seconds 10
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 40
set browser width 366
set browser height 708
open https://www.test.vitality.sumitomolife.co.jp/en/web/vitality-member-portal/stop-smoking
wait seconds 5

  • Expand
  • Collapse

VHR

scenario a user without vhr login to VMP
login using email address Timothy_McBouchard@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario a user with vhr login to VMP
login using email address Benny_McCavanaugh@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Gender

scenario male user login to VMP
login using email address Weldon_McAlbert@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario female user login to VMP
login using email address Denese_McDaugherty@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Vitality Member Status

scenario a blue member login to VMP
login using email address Camellia_McConover@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario a bronze member login to VMP
login using email address Elizabeth_McBaines@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario a silver member login to VMP
login using email address Eric_McBaker@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

scenario a gold member login to VMP
login using email address Deb_McChamberlin@mailinator.com and password TestPass123

  • Expand
  • Collapse

VHC

scenario a user access VMP VHC landing page
wait seconds 10
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 40
set browser width 366
set browser height 708
open https://www.test.vitality.sumitomolife.co.jp/en/web/vitality-member-portal/know-your-health/health-check
wait seconds 5

scenario user agree on the terms and condition
scroll to xpath=//*[@id="agreeTermsAndCond"]
click xpath=//*[@id="checkTermsAndCond"]
wait 1 seconds
check is enabled xpath=//*[@id="agreeTermsAndCond"] true
click xpath=//*[@id="agreeTermsAndCond"]
wait 10 seconds
show take screenshot terms

scenario a user access VMP site
delete all cookies
wait seconds 3
seconds before page load timeout 40
seconds before timeout 40
set browser width 366
set browser height 640
open https://www.test.vitality.sumitomolife.co.jp/en/web/vitality-member-portal
wait seconds 3

scenario user resize the browser to android version
set browser width 366
set browser height 640
wait seconds 2
show take screenshot Captured-screenshot

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .Liferay.VitalityMembersPortal.VMPCentralAsset.01-General.1-LoginAndRegistration.1-UserRegistrationWeb.3-EndToEndRegistration.ScenarioLibrary (edit)

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .Liferay.Configuration.VitalityMemberPortal.01-General.01-LoginAndRegistration.01-Registration (edit)

Note: This is configuration setting for ALL Registration related items.

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Registration Page - Content

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_LOG_LINKNAME=!-Login-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_HEADER=!-Registration-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_NOTE1=!-Before registering with Vitality, you should have received an email from your insurer with your insurer code.-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_NOTE2=!-Please contact your insurer if you have not received a code.-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_EMAIL_LABEL=!-Email Address-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_PASS_LABEL=!-Password-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_CONFIRMPASS_LABEL=!-Confirm Password-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_INSURER_LABEL=!-Insurer Code-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_VITMEM_QUESTION=!-Already a Vitality member?-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_LOGHERE_LINKNAME=!-Login here-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_REG_BUTTON=!-Register-!

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Registration - Terms and Condition Content

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_TC_HEADER=!-Terms and Conditions-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_TC_AGREEBUTTON=!-I Agree-!

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Registration - Disagree

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_DISAGREE_HEADER=!-Disagree-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_DISAGREE_NOTE1=!-You have been successfully logged in, but have not accepted the terms and conditions.-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_DISAGREE_NOTE2=!-If you disagree, you will be logged out and unable to continue until you accept by selecting Agree.-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_DISAGREE_NOTE2=!-Select "Back" to go to the terms and conditions, or "Ok" to log out.-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_DISAGREE_OKBUTTON=!-OK-!

variable defined: VMP_REGISTER_DISAGREE_BACKBUTTON=!-Back-!
  • Expand
  • Collapse

Included page: .Liferay.Configuration.VitalityMemberPortal.01-General.01-LoginAndRegistration.02-Login (edit)

Note: This is configuration setting for ALL Login related items.

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Login Page - Content

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_REG_LINKNAME=!-Register-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_HEADER=!-Login-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_LOG_BUTTON=!-Login-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_REGHERE_LINKNAME=!-Register here-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_NOTE1=!-Not yet a Vitality Member?-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_NOTE2=!-(Vitality Insurer Code Required)-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_EMAIL_LABEL=!-Email Address-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_PASS_LABEL=!-Password-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_FORGOTPASS_LINKNAME=!-Forgot Password-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_LOG_BUTTON=!-Login-!

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Login - Terms and Condition Content

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_TC_HEADER=!-Terms and Conditions-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_TC_AGREEBUTTON=!-I Agree-!

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Login - Unable to Login Content

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_UNABLELOGIN_HEADER=!-Unable to login-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_UNABLE_NOTE1=!-We were unable to authenticate your details.-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_UNABLE_NOTE2=!-Please ensure you enter the correct login details and try again.-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_UNABLE_OKBUTTON=!-OK-!

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Login - Unable to Login Locked Account Content

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_LOCKEDLOGIN_HEADER=!-Unable to login-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_LOCKEDLOGIN_NOTE1=!-Your account has been locked due to exceeding the account lockout threshold.-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_LOCKEDLOGIN_NOTE2=!-Before you can continue, please follow the instructions on the “Forgot Password” page to reset your password.-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_UNABLE_CLOSEBUTTON=!-Close-!

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_UNABLE_FORGOTPASSBUTTON=!-Forgot Password-!

  • Expand
  • Collapse

Logout

variable defined: VMP_LOGIN_LOGOUTBUTTON=!-Logout-!

scenario user is in registration page
click Register
wait for visible Registration
show take screenshot Registration
wait 3 seconds

scenario user clicks login hyperlink
click Login
wait 3 seconds

scenario user clicks login here hyperlink
click Login here
wait 3 seconds

scenario user clicks register hyperlink
click Register
wait 3 seconds

scenario user clicks register here hyperlink
click Register here
wait 3 seconds

scenario login page is displayed
wait for visible Login
wait 3 seconds
show take screenshot Login

scenario registration page is displayed
wait for visible Registration
wait 3 seconds
take screenshot Registration

scenario user clicks logout button
click Logout

scenario user is logged out and directed to log out page
ensure is visible Login
show take screenshot Logged Out
wait 3 seconds


scenario newly registered user who agree T&C can log in again
enter Chrystal_McCastle@mailinator.com as xpath=//*[@id="email"]
enter TestPass123 as xpath=//*[@id="password"]
wait 1 seconds
show take screenshot Entered Login Credentials
click Login
wait 3 seconds

scenario newly registered user who disagree T&C can log in again
enter Normand_McDick@mailinator.com as xpath=//*[@id="email"]
enter TestPass123 as xpath=//*[@id="password"]
show take screenshot Entered Login Credentials
click Login
wait 3 seconds

scenario user is logged in and T&C popup did not displayed
wait for visible Logout
ensure is visible Logout
show take screenshot Logged In and No TAC displayed
wait 3 seconds

scenario user is logged in and T&C popup is displayed
ensure is visible Terms and Conditions
show take screenshot Logged In and TAC displayed
wait 3 seconds
  • Expand
  • Collapse

scenario user registers with username username and password password and insurer code insurercode
wait for visible Register
click Register
ensure is visible Login
ensure is visible Registration
ensure is visible Before registering with Vitality, you should have received an email from your insurer with your insurer code.
ensure is visible Please contact your insurer if you have not received a code.
ensure is visible Email Address
ensure is visible Password
ensure is visible Confirm Password
ensure is visible Insurer Code
ensure is visible Already a Vitality member?
ensure is visible Login here
check value of xpath=//*[@id="submitRegForm"] Register
show take screenshot Registration Landing Page
enter @{username} as xpath=//*[@id="email"]
enter @{password} as xpath=//*[@id="password"]
enter @{password} as xpath=//*[@id="confirm_password"]
enter @{insurercode} as xpath=//*[@id="insurer_code"]
click xpath=//*[@id="submitRegForm"]
wait 3 seconds


scenario user registers with username username and password passwordA and password passwordB and insurer code insurercode
wait for visible Login
click Login
ensure is visible Login
ensure is visible Registration
ensure is visible Before registering with Vitality, you should have received an email from your insurer with your insurer code.
ensure is visible Please contact your insurer if you have not received a code.
ensure is visible Email Address
ensure is visible Password
ensure is visible Confirm Password
ensure is visible Insurer Code
ensure is visible Insurer Code
ensure is visible Already a Vitality member?
ensure is visible Login here
check value of xpath=//*[@id="submitRegForm"] Register
show take screenshot Registration Landing Page
enter @{username} as xpath=//*[@id="email"]
enter @{passwordA} as xpath=//*[@id="password"]
enter @{passwordB} as xpath=//*[@id="confirm_password"]
enter @{insurercode} as xpath=//*[@id="insurer_code"]
click xpath=//*[@id="submitRegForm"]
wait 3 seconds


scenario terms and conditions is displayed
check value of xpath=//*[@id="termsAndCondModal"]/div/div/div[1]/h4 Terms and Conditions
